books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: After reconnecting with one of his first students, who is now a billionaire futurist, symbology professor Robert Langdon must go on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: A new collection of poetry from the author of "Milk and Honey."
books.name: THE SUN AND HER FLOWERS

books.author: by Stephen King and Owen King
books.description: In a small Appalachian town, women who fall asleep don't wake up and become shrouded in mysterious cocoons while the men battle one another.
books.name: SLEEPING BEAUTIES

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The fears of seven teenagers are rekindled in their adult lives by the terrifying title character. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: IT

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: A Miami lawyer solicits an Army veteran to go on a secret mission to recover $60 million stashed away in Cuba.
books.name: THE CUBAN AFFAIR

books.author: by Jennifer Egan
books.description: Anna Kerrigan, the first female diver at the Brooklyn Naval Yard during World War II, meets with a man who helps her understand why her father disappeared.
books.name: MANHATTAN BEACH

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Det. Napoleon Dumas investigates a murder and uncovers clues about personal events that happened 15 years ago.
books.name: DON'T LET GO

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: A pair of lovers find themselves on opposite sides of a conflict while Queen Elizabeth fights to maintain her throne.
books.name: A COLUMN OF FIRE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A temp, who works for a strict and stressed boss is given a social life when family members create an online dating profile for her.
books.name: MERRY AND BRIGHT

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: When Merit Voss learns a family secret, she tries to escape the family but fails and must face the consequences.
books.name: WITHOUT MERIT

books.author: by David Lagercrantz
books.description: Stieg Larsson's character Lisbeth Salander seeks to uncover the secrets of her childhood.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO TAKES AN EYE FOR AN EYE

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The Quinns celebrate the holidays when one family member returns from the war in Afghanistan but the gathering turns rocky.
books.name: WINTER SOLSTICE

books.author: by James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: A New York detective on vacation in Maine is enlisted to help solve a crime in the woods.
books.name: HAUNTED

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS
